presentationColumns.name: Cash
presentationColumns.description: Shows the cash balance for a particular time period for the CASH financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cash in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Accounts Payable
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Accounts Payable balance for a particular time period for the AP financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Accounts Payable in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Accounts Receivable
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Accounts Receivable balance for a particular time period for the AR financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Accounts Receivable in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Raw Material Inventory
presentationColumns.description: Shows the raw material inventory balance for a particular time period for the RM INV financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Raw Material Inventory in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Work in Process Inventory
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Work in Process inventory balance for a particular time period for the WIP INV financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Work in Process Inventory in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Finished Goods Inventory
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Finished Goods inventory balance for a particular time period for the FG INV financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Finished Goods Inventory in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Inventories
presentationColumns.description: The metric is computed as follows: Raw Material Inventory + Work in Process Inventory + Finished Goods Inventory.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Inventories in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Prepaid Expenses
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Prepaid Expenses balance for a particular time period for the PPAID EXP financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Prepaid Expenses in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Deferred Cost of Goods Sold
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Deferred Cost of Goods Sold balance for a particular time period for the DEFERRED COGS financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Deferred Cost of Goods Sold in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Other Current Assets
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Other Current Assets balance for a particular time period for the OTHER CA financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Current Assets in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Current Assets
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Cash + Inventories + Prepaid Expenses + Other Current Assets + Accounts Receivable + Deferred Cost of Goods Sold.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Assets in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: PPE
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Property, Plant, and Equipment (PPE) for a particular time period for the PPE financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.PPE in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Accumulated Depreciation
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Accumulated Depreciation for a particular time period for the ACC DEPCN financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Accumulated Depreciation in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Net PPE
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : PPE - Accumulated Depreciation.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Net PPE in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Goodwill
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Goodwill for a particular time period for the GOODWILL financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Goodwill in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Other Assets
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Other Assets for a particular time period for the OTHER ASSET financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Assets in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Long Term Assets
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Net PPE + Goodwill + Other Asset.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Long Term Assets in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Total Assets
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Long Term Assets + Current Assets.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Assets in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Accrued Liabilities
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Accrued Liabilities for a particular time period for the ACC LIAB financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Accrued Liabilities in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Short Term Borrowing
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Short Term Borrowing for a particular time period for the ST BORR financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Short Term Borrowing in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Tax Liabilities
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Tax Liabilities for a particular time period for the TAX LIAB financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Tax Liabilities in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Deferred Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Deferred Revenue for a particular time period for the DEFERRED REVENUE financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Deferred Revenue in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Other Current Liabilities
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Other Current Liabilities for a particular time period for the OTHER CL financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Current Liabilities in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Current Liabilities
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Accrued Liabilities + Short Term Borrowing + Other Current Liabilities + Accounts Payable + Deferred Revenue +Tax Liabilities.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Liabilities in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Long Term Debt
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Long term Debt for a particular time period for the LT DEBT financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Long Term Debt in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Other Liabilities
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Other Liabilities for a particular time period for the OTHER LIAB financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Liabilities in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Long Term Liabilities
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Long Term Debt + Other Liabilities.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Long Term Liabilities in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Preferred Stock
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Preferred Stock for a particular time period for the PREF STOCK financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Preferred Stock in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Common Stock
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Common Stock for a particular time period for the CMMN STOCK financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Common Stock in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Retained Earnings
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Retained Earnings balance for a particular time period for the RET EARNING financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Retained Earnings in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Other Equity
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Other Equity balance for a particular time period for the OTHER EQUITY financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Equity in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Total Shareholders Funds
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Preferred Stock + Common Stock + Retained Earnings + Other Equity.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Shareholders Funds in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Total Liabilities
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Current Liabilities + Long Term Liabilities.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Liabilities in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Total Liabilities and Shareholders Funds
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Total Liabilities + Total Shareholders Funds.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Liabilities and Shareholders Funds in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Net Working Capital
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Current Assets - Current Liabilities.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Net Working Capital in Analytics Currency
